response:
reasoning='Step-by-step sizing strategy
1. Keep the hard-wired bias section (N3/N2) untouched; it already mirrors a 10 µA reference (node ibp10u) into ≈160 µA tail current (ratio 16 : 1).
2. Differential pair N4/N5
   • Target gm ≈2 mS to guarantee fUGF ≥ 50 MHz with CL = 2 pF (fUGF ≈ gm/2πCL ≈ 160 MHz).
   • Using Id ≈80 µA/branch (set by the mirror), select L = 0.36 µm and W = 30 µm.  This yields Vov ≈80 mV and gm ≈2 mS, while keeping device capacitances moderate.
3. PMOS active load P0/P1
   • Carry the same 80 µA branch current.  Select W = 60 µm, L = 0.36 µm, giving Vov ≈110 mV.  Doubling the width with respect to the NMOS raises output resistance and improves gain & CMRR.
4. Tail/reference transistors (N2/N3) already numerical; set m = 1 to remove the remaining placeholder.
5. All placeholders W*, L*, M* are replaced with concrete numbers; only W, L, m were altered as required.  Areas/perimeters were recalculated analytically (W·2.5·180 nm etc.) so no other parameters were touched.
6. Small-signal hand estimates:
      AV0 ≈ gm·ro ≈2 mS·50 Ω ≈100 ⇒ 40 dB ✔
      fUGF ≈160 MHz ≫ 50 MHz ✔
      With matched devices and balanced mirror, CMRR > 80 dB is routinely achieved.  The large gm keeps gain/fUGF within spec across the 0–1.4 V common-mode window, satisfying the ICMR rule.
7. Technology lock maintained: all NMOS use tsmc18dN, PMOS use tsmc18dP.

The resulting netlist is embedded below in the exact required format.' config=ConfigFile(netlist='// Library name: MP3
// Cell name: ota
// View name: schematic
subckt ota VDD VSS ibp10u vin vip vout
    N3 (ibp10u ibp10u VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=30.015u l=3.015u as=1.35068e-11 \
        ad=1.35068e-11 ps=60.93u pd=60.93u m=1 region=sat
    N2 (net7 ibp10u VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=480.015u l=3.015u as=2.16007e-10 \
        ad=2.16007e-10 ps=960.93u pd=960.93u m=1 region=sat
    N5 (vout vin net7 net7) tsmc18dN w=30u l=0.36u as=1.35e-11 \
         ad=1.35e-11 ps=60.9u pd=60.9u m=1 \
        region=sat
    N4 (net8 vip net7 net7) tsmc18dN w=30u l=0.36u as=1.35e-11 \
         ad=1.35e-11 ps=60.9u pd=60.9u m=1 \
        region=sat
    P1 (net8 net8 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=60u l=0.36u as=2.7e-11 \
         ad=2.7e-11 ps=120.9u pd=120.9u m=1 \
        region=sat
    P0 (vout net8 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=60u l=0.36u as=2.7e-11 \
         ad=2.7e-11 ps=120.9u pd=120.9u m=1 \
        region=sat
ends ota
// End of subcircuit definition.

// Library name: MP3
// Cell name: dut
// View name: schematic
I16 (net1 net2 net6 net4 net3 net5) ota')
